text: Renovated in May 2024 and now the interior is better than ever

Went on a Saturday noon. There was 2 lady salespersons. One of the lady salesperson looked v annoyed after I took a children sneaker to take a look, came over to rearrange the shoes on the rack immediately after I put back the sneaker. I didn't know the outlet turned into an art exhibition where there is a no touch, only admire policy.

Walked into the shop around 2pm on a Wednesday. There was no other Customer besides myself. There were two SA who were busy arranging or sorting out goods. Nobody attended to me but when I waved to a young chap he came over immediately. He check out my feet and recommended me a neutral support (880). He helped me to decide between getting a pair of really nice looking shoes vs a pair of suitable one.  Thumbs up to him for his knowledge! Just came back from my run and this is really comfy especially around the ankle! Look for him when you are there:)

I recently had the pleasure of being assisted by Helen Ng at New Balance (Velocity outlet), and her service was absolutely impeccable. From the moment we walked in, she greeted us with a warm and friendly smile, instantly making us feel welcomed. Not only did she provide excellent customer service, but she also went above and beyond by engaging in pleasant small talks, making the experience even more enjoyable. What stood out about Helen was her genuine approach; she never tried to force sell any products or services, which was truly refreshing. I highly recommend Helen for her exceptional service and commendable professionalism.

Helen the store assistant manager is sooo helpful and so approachable. I felt like i am serviced by a long lost friend instead of a staff. Thanks for making my shopping experience so indelible even after expressing of not making a purchase today, she still delivered her best service in explaining the insights of my sole from the test done.
